user.title: Select Tesla Vehicle
user.description:
Select your Tesla vehicle from the discovered devices below, or enter your VIN manually to search.

Make sure your vehicle is nearby and awake.

manual_vin.title: Enter VIN
manual_vin.description:
Enter your vehicle's VIN (Vehicle Identification Number) to search for it.

The VIN can be found in the Tesla app, on your vehicle registration, or on the dashboard (visible through the windshield).

bluetooth_confirm.title: Confirm Tesla Vehicle

generate_key.title: Generate or Import Key
generate_key.description:
To communicate with your Tesla, a cryptographic key pair is required.

**Generate new key:** Create a new key pair for this Home Assistant instance.
**Import existing key:** Use an existing private key (e.g., from another Home Assistant installation).

import_key.title: Import Existing Key
import_key.description: Enter your existing private key in hexadecimal format.

pair_key.title: Pair Key with Vehicle
pair_key.description:
Enter your vehicle's VIN (Vehicle Identification Number) and a name for this key.

The VIN can be found in the Tesla app or on your vehicle registration.

**Your public key:**
`{public_key}`

tap_key_card.title: Tap Key Card
tap_key_card.description:
To authorize the new key, please:

1. Sit inside your vehicle
2. Place your Tesla key card on the center console
3. Wait for confirmation (up to 30 seconds)

Press **Submit** after tapping your key card.

already_paired.title: Verify Existing Key
already_paired.description: If your key is already paired with the vehicle, enter the VIN to verify the connection.

error.no_devices_found: No Tesla vehicles found nearby. You can enter your VIN manually to search, or make sure your vehicle is nearby and awake.
error.no_device_selected: Please select a device or choose to enter VIN manually.
error.vehicle_not_found: Could not find a vehicle with this VIN nearby. Make sure your vehicle is within Bluetooth range and awake.
error.cannot_connect: Could not connect to the vehicle. Make sure it is nearby and awake.
error.invalid_key: Invalid private key format. Please enter a valid hexadecimal string.
error.invalid_vin: Invalid VIN. The VIN must be exactly 17 characters.
error.pairing_failed: Failed to pair the key with the vehicle.
error.timeout: Timed out waiting for key card tap. Please try again.
error.key_not_added: Key was not added to the vehicle. Make sure you tapped the key card on the center console.
error.key_not_paired: The key is not paired with this vehicle. Please pair the key first.
error.verification_failed: Failed to verify the key with the vehicle.

init.title: Tesla BLE Options
init.description:
Configure polling options for your Tesla vehicle.

Polling interval determines how often the integration connects to your vehicle to check its status. Lower values provide more frequent updates but may impact vehicle battery.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the vehicle for status updates. Default is 60 seconds.
